task_meta_ids.description: List of project task IDs as described by `task_meta_id`

task_name.description: The final name of the merged project task, an empty strings is valid. The final merged task will attempt to match existing names and if found merge into that `task_meta_id`

billable.description: The final state of the merged project tasks; `1` = Billable, `0` = Non-billable
